answers.answer: Hi, the most probable cause for the odd sensation could be neuropathy, a disorder of the nerves. Headaches can be a consequence of this or due to other causes like migraine, hypertension or inflammatory disorders. Most common cause for neuropathy is diabetes.  It can also be due to metabolic disorders, vitamin deficiencies, infections and traumatic injuries. The sensation may need proper evaluation by your GP, please consult him for a cardiovascular and neurological assessment. Regards.
